title: NEED RIOT HELP ASAP
body: so yesterday during loading screen my AVG randomly says it found a virus in one of the riot folders (not necessarily a file from you guys though) and i couldnt minimise the window or anything, no alt tab or task manager, only thing the avg window would allow me to do was click a 'restart my pc' kinda option, then after that i couldnt open league after clicking launch, I ended up having to completely redownload LoL because nothing else was working, spent like an hour trying everything else first (read like 25 different forum threads and there wasn't any help in those)... Now its finally working now xD BUT... I got lower priority queue of 10 mins for the 'AFK', which I blatantly couldn't avoid... Idek what happened, but if you could please take this restriction off my account it would be highly appreciated!

replies.body: Best place to ask is to file a support ticket, not on the forums... but you don't get low priority queue for leaving one match.

Dude I got the 5 min low priority like a couple weeks ago and since then I haven't afkd or dodged a game or anything... so I have indeed earnt this unfairly.. :/ could you explain to me how to file a support ticket?

> [{quoted}](name=Son Of xPeke,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4yh1IQ4r,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-07T23:21:42.315+0000)
>
> Dude I got the 5 min low priority like a couple weeks ago and since then I haven't afkd or dodged a game or anything... so I have indeed earnt this unfairly.. :/ could you explain to me how to file a support ticket?

Oh damn, that does suck. At the top left of the page when you are boards there is a support button :P. Click it. There'll be a get help button there. Go there, click that you have a question about LoL and lodge your case. Good luck.
